judicialResults.label: Suspended sentence order - imprisonment
judicialResults.resultText:
SUSPS - Suspended sentence order - imprisonment
Committed to prison for 7 Months suspended for 10 Months. Reason: failure to comply with requirements of post custodial sentence supervision. The defendant must comply with the requirements within the supervision period.  In the event of activation of sentence: 0 bail remand days to count. Total custodial period 5 Months. Supervision period: 6 Months.

Attendance Centre Requirement: Attend for 80 Hours.
